channel.title: Should i make my skiller a pvp account?
channel.description:
please tell me if you think i should make my skiller account a pvp account! its lvl 3 but tell me what you think i should do with it! here's the skills! its not the best but..
[img]http://file:///C:/Users/matros/Desktop/skills.png[/img]

item.title: Should i make my skiller a pvp account?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:8, topic:442905”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=545596.msg4002918#msg4002918 date=1338258736]
Do a zerker pure, skillers are very boring.
[/quote]

I have a skiller and it’s not too boring.[/quote]Well I use to thought otherwise, but then I got hacked on my skiller that I had worked on for over a year and lost a lot of cash so I decided I didn’t like skillers anymore.

Read full topic
item.source: Should i make my skiller a pvp account?

item.title: Should i make my skiller a pvp account?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Lin:

Train everything. RuneScape is so much more fun when you experience all it has to offer and not limit yourself to only certain things.

Read full topic

item.title: Should i make my skiller a pvp account?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

mattiasrosendahl:

alright, but im really tired of skilling! The only non-combat skills i like is firemaking and cooking but i really cant afford it any more! im 94 in firemaking and it costed me a bit:/

FM is expensive? I mean… if you use magic logs like me, it will cost a bit, but you can use willows/maples and it won’t cost you much… Cooking is pretty cheap too…

Read full topic
